text: The 1983 Soviet Cup was an association football cup competition of the Soviet Union. The winner of the competition, Shakhter Donetsk qualified for the continental tournament. ==Competition schedule== ===First preliminary round=== All games took place on February 19, 1983. {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font- size:90% |align=right| Daugava Riga |align=center|1:2 | Dinamo Kirov | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Guria Lanchkhuti |align=center|0:0 | Fakel Voronezh |, |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Iskra Smolensk |align=center|2:0 | Zaria Voroshilovgrad | (in Moscow) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Kairat Alma-Ata |align=center|2:0 | Kuzbass Kemerovo | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Kolos Nikopol |align=center|1:0 | Tekstilschik Ivanovo | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Kuban Krasnodar |align=center|3:0 | Dnepr Mogilev | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Pamir Dushanbe |align=center|0:1 | Rotor Volgograd | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Tavria Simferopol |align=center|1:0 | SKA Karpaty Lvov | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Zvezda Dzhizzak |align=center|0:1 | Lokomotiv Moscow | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| SKA Khabarovsk |align=center|+:– | Shinnik Yaroslavl | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| SKA Rostov-na-Donu |align=center|+:– | Metallurg Zaporozhie | |} ===Second preliminary round=== The base game day was February 24, 1983 {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Chernomorets Odessa |align=center|1:0 | Kolos Nikopol | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dinamo Kirov |align=center|0:0 | Ararat Yerevan |, (in Sochi) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dnepr Dnepropetrovsk |align=center|2:0 | Lokomotiv Moscow | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Metallist Kharkov |align=center|0:0 | Kairat Alma-Ata |, (in Sochi) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Neftchi Baku |align=center|1:1 | CSKA Moscow |, |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Pakhtakor Tashkent |align=center|2:1 | SKA Khabarovsk | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Rotor Volgograd |align=center|1:0 | Dinamo Tbilisi | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| SKA Rostov-na-Donu |align=center|3:2 | Dinamo Minsk | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Spartak Moscow |align=center|3:2 | Tavria Simferopol | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Torpedo Moscow |align=center|1:0 | Guria Lanchkhuti | (in Adler) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dinamo Moscow |align=center|1:0 | Kuban Krasnodar | (February 25, 1983) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Nistru Kishinev |align=center|0:2 | Torpedo Kutaisi | (February 25, 1983) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Shakhter Donetsk |align=center|3:0 | Zhalgiris Vilnius | (in Sochi, February 25, 1983) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Zenit Leningrad |align=center|3:0 | Iskra Smolensk | (February 25, 1983) |} ===Round of 16=== The base game day was March 3, 1983 {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Ararat Yerevan |align=center|2:4 | Metallist Kharkov | (in Oktemberyan) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Chernomorets Odessa |align=center|0:2 | Zenit Leningrad | |- style=font- size:90% |align=right| CSKA Moscow |align=center|2:1 | SKA Rostov-na-Donu | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dnepr Dnepropetrovsk |align=center|3:1 | Torpedo Moscow | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Pakhtakor Tashkent |align=center|0:1 | Dinamo Moscow | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Spartak Moscow |align=center|2:3 | Shakhter Donetsk | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Torpedo Kutaisi |align=center|3:2 | Rotor Volgograd | (in Samtredia) |} ===Quarterfinals=== The base game day was March 11, 1983 {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Metallist Kharkov |align=center|0:0 | Torpedo Kutaisi |, |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Zenit Leningrad |align=center|3:1 | Dinamo Kiev | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| CSKA Moscow |align=center|2:1 | Dnepr Dnepropetrovsk | (March 12, 1983) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dinamo Moscow |align=center|1:3 | Shakhter Donetsk | (in Tashkent, March 12, 1983) |} ===Semifinals=== The base game day was March 19, 1983 {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| CSKA Moscow |align=center|0:1 | Metallist Kharkov | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Shakhter Donetsk |align=center|1:1 | Zenit Leningrad |, |} ===Final=== ==External links== * Complete calendar. helmsoccer.narod.ru * 1983 Soviet Cup.
